titleStmt.title: The speech of that vvorthy knight, Sir Beniamin Rudierd, spoken in Parliament; concerning the placing of good and able divines in parishes miserably destitute of instruction, through want of maintenance. And confirmed by the testimonies of three judicious, and learned men.
titleStmt.author: Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.
